title: Help & Knowledge Center
description: Comprehensive help system for legal case management
overview: The Help & Knowledge Center provides contextual assistance, tutorials, and documentation to help you navigate the legal case management system effectively.

keyFeatures.title: Contextual Help
keyFeatures.description: Get help specific to the page or task you're working on

keyFeatures.title: Field-Level Tooltips
keyFeatures.description: Hover over form fields to see helpful guidance and best practices

keyFeatures.title: Guided Tours
keyFeatures.description: Step-by-step walkthroughs for key workflows and processes

keyFeatures.title: Glossary Integration
keyFeatures.description: Automatic tooltips for legal and technical terms throughout the application

keyFeatures.title: Search & Discovery
keyFeatures.description: Powerful search across all help content, articles, and documentation

quickStart.title: Access Help
quickStart.description: Click the Help & Knowledge Base link in the sidebar or look for ? icons throughout the application

quickStart.title: Search for Content
quickStart.description: Use the search bar to find specific help articles, tutorials, or glossary terms

quickStart.title: Start a Tour
quickStart.description: Click 'Start Tour' buttons to get guided walkthroughs of key features

quickStart.title: Use Field Tooltips
quickStart.description: Hover over ? icons next to form fields for context-specific guidance

commonTasks.title: Find Help for Current Page
commonTasks.description: Look for Page Help buttons in the header of each module

commonTasks.title: Learn Legal Terms
commonTasks.description: Hover over highlighted terms to see glossary definitions

commonTasks.title: Get Form Field Help
commonTasks.description: Click the ? icon next to any form field for detailed guidance

commonTasks.title: Access Guided Tours
commonTasks.description: Use Start Tour buttons to learn workflows step-by-step
